title: KeyConf24 recordings available
content: KeyConf24, our 2024 Keycloak Identity Summit, happened in Vienna in September this year. We were excited to have a full room on site, and 150+ people watching online.  Thanks to our event sponsor adorsys, all recorded videos are now available online at the event’s website: . Re-watch the talks and learn from practitioners, developers and maintainers.  Thanks to all our sponsors adorsys, Banfico, Hitachi and Red Hat who made this event possible!   *     Daniel Goldschneider (The OpenWallet Foundation)   *     Vinod Anandan (JPMorgan Chase & Co.)   *     Francis Pouatcha (adorsys)   *     Takashi Norimatsu (Hitachi, Ltd.)   *     Václav Muzikář (Red Hat)   *     Marek Posolda (Red Hat)   *     Pritish Joshi (Banfico)   *     Martin Bartoš (Red Hat)   *     Dmitry Telegin (Backbase UK)   *     GR Patil (Phase Two)   *     Martin Besozzi (TwoGenIdentity)
